Method Detail

setParent

public void setParent(InputMap map)
Suppressed: Sets this InputMap's parent.

Parameters:
map - the InputMap that is the parent of this one

getParent

public InputMap getParent()
Suppressed: Gets this InputMap's parent.

Returns:
map the InputMap that is the parent of this one, or null if this InputMap has no parent

put

public void put(KeyStroke keyStroke,
                Object actionMapKey)
Suppressed: Adds a binding for keyStroke to actionMapKey. If actionMapKey is null, this removes the current binding for keyStroke.

get

public Object get(KeyStroke keyStroke)
Suppressed: Returns the binding for keyStroke, messaging the parent InputMap if the binding is not locally defined.

remove

public void remove(KeyStroke key)
Suppressed: Removes the binding for key from this InputMap.

clear

public void clear()
Suppressed: Removes all the mappings from this InputMap.

keys

public KeyStroke[] keys()
Suppressed: Returns the KeyStrokes that are bound in this InputMap.

size

public int size()
Suppressed: Returns the number of KeyStroke bindings.

allKeys

public KeyStroke[] allKeys()
Suppressed: Returns an array of the KeyStrokes defined in this InputMap and its parent. This differs from keys() in that this method includes the keys defined in the parent.
